name: CAR WARS - ZX SPECTRUM (Salva Cantero) (POR 004)
description:
Game created by @Salvakantero (Twitter) for ZX Spectrum microcomputer (128Kb)

As every year, our chief proposes a motor race
with which to implement our mechanical knowledge
acquired at the garage. The prize is an extra payment.
This time you did your homework and you built a
car in your spare time that has nothing to wnvy to a
F1! But the stages that you have to overcome  have
been located and designed to try the patience of
the fastest drivers.

This game was physically edited by Playonretro

www.playonretro.com
